name: Red Riding 2045
description:
"Red Riding 2045" is a post-apocalyptic cyberpunk game where players take on the role of the last remaining delivery service in a world overrun by meta zombies. 

Armed with a laser sword and a minigun-equipped truck, players must navigate treacherous deserts while fending off deadly mechanical spiders.

PLAY SOLO OR CO-OP

The game can be played solo or in couch co-op, and the goal is to deliver packages to the other end of the desert successfully.

GAME SETTING

In the world of "Red Riding 2045," the apocalypse was caused by a catastrophic event that turned most of the planet into a desert wasteland. A powerful technology company attempted to merge virtual reality with the human brain.

The experiment caused a massive virtual reality glitch that caused the fabric of reality to collapse, resulting in widespread destruction and the emergence of meta zombies - human test subjects who were permanently fused with virtual reality devices.

The game was created in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2022 event and is in a prototype state.
